TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the applicant was dismissed from his job ; his former employer also required him to make certain payments in respect of damage allegedly caused while in service . The applicant challenged these measures before the courts as of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed his action . On DATE ORG quashed this decision and remitted the case .

CARDINAL . The resumed proceedings were suspended on DATE pending the simultaneous criminal proceedings conducted against the applicant . After the termination of this case , the procedure restarted and ORG gave judgment on DATE , dismissing the applicant 's claims .

CARDINAL . On appeal , on CARDINAL May CARDINAL ORG , in a partial judgment , accepted some of the applicant 's claims , holding that his dismissal had been unlawful and reducing the reimbursement payable .
CARDINAL . NORP However , on DATE ORG reversed this decision , dismissed the applicant 's case and upheld ORG judgment . This decision was served on the applicant 's lawyer on DATE .
